name: Granny Goes Deep
description:
Granny Goes Deep is a fast paced arcade-style game where you play as Granny and attempt to find your little Jimmy by falling down a hole, going deeper and deeper.

You can move left and right with the arrow keys or [a]/[d] and use your walker to catch a fall and prevent fall damage by pressing [space] before landing on a platform.

We made this game including all assets, sound effects, voice lines and music from scratch during the jam. The only external asset we used is the SilomBol font for the pixel art text in the UI.

We are all pretty new to game dev and jams in general. This was our first game jam and it was a ton of fun participating in LD48 and making the game - we hope you have as much fun playing it as we had making it!

Features:

  • Fast paced arcade-style gameplay
  • 18 different platform types to find while going deeper
  • Heartbreaking story and cinematic intro scene
  • Humorous voice lines and texts
  • Random farts
  • BINGO!

Credits:

  • @beepboop (Sebastian): Development, Animation Logic, Play-Testing, Balancing, Narrator Voice
  • @cookargh (Russell): All of the Art and Assets
  • @exio4 (Esteban): Development, Map Generation, Physics, Tons of Bug Fixes
  • @kieranmontgomery (Kieran): Development, Intro Scene, Music, Sound Effects
  • @spliddo (Martin): Development, User Interface, Screens, Texts
  • @universeflow (Daniel): Development, Coordination, HUD, Music
  • Tom Tor (tomtor.com): SilomBol font used in the UI
